feed.title: Tamir Wellness
feed.subtitle: Tamir Wellness Tourist Camp is located in Terelj National Park, one of the most beautiful places in Mongolia. Visit us during your Mongolia trip.

entry.title: Restaurant
entry.content: Tamir restaurant is capable of serving 100 people at the same time. We serve breakfast, lunch, and dinner that include both international and domestic dishes.
entry.summary: Tamir restaurant is capable of serving 100 people at the same time. We serve breakfast, lunch, and dinner that include both international and domestic dishes.

entry.title: Gers
entry.content: We have 26 gers (Mongolian traditional yurt) with a total capacity of 100 people.
entry.summary: We have 26 gers (Mongolian traditional yurt) with a total capacity of 100 people.

entry.title: Mini bar
entry.content: There is a mini bar inside the restaurant, where we have a fine selection of hot and cold beverages.
entry.summary: There is a mini bar inside the restaurant, where we have a fine selection of hot and cold beverages.

entry.title: Ger Interior
entry.content:
Our gers are all handmade. Traditionally hand painted in colorful patterns expressing an authentic feel.

A cosy and comfortable ger from which you can look up the skylight and enjoy a night under the stars!
entry.summary: Our gers are all handmade. Traditionally hand painted in colorful patterns expressing an authentic feel. A cosy and comfortable ger from which you can look up the skylight and enjoy a night under the stars!

entry.title: Fantastic Rocks
entry.content:
A mini hiking tour to explore over 30 incredible rock formations. The trip takes approximately 2 hours.

Beautiful panoramic view from the top of the mountain, green meadow with colorful flowers, huge rock formations and interesting hiking paths are all there waiting for you.

entry.title: Visiting Nomadic Family
entry.content:
Terelj National Park is home to nomadic Mongolians, offering you a chance to interact with the authentic people of Mongolia – hospitable, gracious and welcoming.

Visit real Mongolian nomadic families and experience their everyday life, custom, and tradition.
entry.summary: Terelj National Park is home to nomadic Mongolians, offering you a chance to interact with the authentic people of Mongolia – hospitable, gracious and welcoming. Visit real Mongolian nomadic families and experience their everyday life, custom, and tradition.

entry.title: Cuisine
entry.content: You can taste Mongolian traditional meals such as khuushuur, buuz, tsuivan and khorkhog in our restaurant.
entry.summary: You can taste Mongolian traditional meals such as khuushuur, buuz, tsuivan and khorkhog in our restaurant.

entry.title: Seminar
entry.content: We provide a room for events or meetings with a capacity of up to 50 people. Coffee, tea, and soft snacks can be served during the breaks.
entry.summary: We provide a room for events or meetings with a capacity of up to 50 people. Coffee, tea, and soft snacks can be served during the breaks.

entry.title: Horse Riding
entry.content:
Mongolia is the best destination for horse-riding trip, and especially, Terelj National Park is the best recommended place for a horseback travel.

We offer horseback riding trip in the beautiful horse trail region with wild flower steppes, rivers, and mountains. You can rent horses hourly or daily basis with a guide.
